event.title: clashes with riot police overnight Saturday

data.event: South Korean authorities are refusing to allow more protests against the government's decision to allow beef imports from the United States, after hundreds of people were injured in clashes with riot police overnight Saturday.

event.title: Sunday, where a candlelight vigil was scheduled

data.event: Around 300 police buses blocked protesters from entering the plaza in front of Seoul City Hall on Sunday, where a candlelight vigil was scheduled for that night.
